Reviews.Content: this camera works great! I had this camera for 6 months now the picture quality is very good would highly recommend

Reviews.Title: excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: Carlos Escalante F.
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera because it was  not expensive. I didn't expect what I got. This is is really nice camera, easy to use and easy to set up. I actually have two of them. I do recomend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Surveillance camera
Reviews.Author: Jan C. Hunt
Reviews.Content: Once you get it setup this camera works great with your home/office WIFI. You can turn it in any  direction from setting at you computer. You can monitor things in other areas.

Reviews.Title: This camera is Garbage.  Spend a bit more and get a Foscam or Wansview
Reviews.Author: James Longfellow
Reviews.Content: I currently have five of these type of cameras under four different brands.  There are a lot of imitations of the Foscam and they are not all the same.  Some are good and some are not.  This one falls under the latter category.  I had it set up at our camper in the mountains so I can keep an eye on the snowfall.  This one replaced an old one that stopped working, that I bought about six years ago.  It was trouble from the start.  First, you cannot view it from within the network, which is really stupid.  It takes forever for the router to recognize it.  More often than not I can't even connect to it from outside the network at all.  Then, when it does finally come up, it is agonizingly slow.  Slow to bring up an image, snail-like slow when panning and scanning with it.  It is very choppy.  It constantly cuts out and reboots for no apparent reason.  When it does reboot the camera goes all over the place and always seems to end up facing backwards.  And since it takes forever to pan, it takes a half an hour just to get it facing forward again.  I got sick of the aggravation and replaced it with my WansView camera at home just to eliminate the possibility that it was a slow network connection, and the WansView worked like a charm.  Connects every time and quickly, and pans and scans quickly.  Once I confirmed this camera was the problem I packed this piece of crap back in the box and returned it.  I bought a Foscam in place of it, and when that came I put that one up at the camper, and again it was very quick and easy to set up and connected quickly every time, and pans and scans quickly.  Three other brands of this camera worked perfectly in the same location with the same hardware, so this camera is definitely the problem.  Since there is only about two or three dollars difference between the Tenvis and the WansView, save yourself a lot of aggravation and spend the extra money.  If you want the absolute best pan and scan ip camera out there, get the Foscam.  It is more expensive, but it is the best.

Reviews.Title: Very Good for retail stores
Reviews.Author: Zhijuan Wei
Reviews.Content: Hey, guys, Sorry for give comments so late, I need time to install three cameras and get my new route setup.I bought four cameras for my store it functions very well. I have a 1500 square feet store, four cameras is enough for me. These cameras works very well during the night, the night view is clear enough for me to see every thing.The 355 degree Horizontal and 90 degree vertical view is very helpful and functions well.It’s very easy for me to set up the program on my windows 7, Mac and mobile phone.The seller is very nice, they can reply your email in 10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Save your money and invest in CCTV technology instead
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: These Tenvis cameras have been more than a headache and hassle to use;  It was extremely difficult to configure these cameras to operate on my home wifi network. The cameras tampered and modified various setting on my ASUS RT-66N wireless router without my permission, causing frequent internet disconnects and requiring a complete hard-reset and reconfiguration of my router in order to correct the issue. Customer service from the Tenvis manufacturer is non-existent. The cameras also (without warning) would randomly pan and tilt up and down, back and forth without my controlling the functions from the Tenvis software downloaded to my computer. I recommend anyone who is in the market for IP cameras (in general) to stay away from all makes and models, at least until the technology improves. Some food for thought;  Most of all IP cameras on the market today are BETA versions of anticipated improved future products. In other words, the consumers who purchase these gadgets are being used as "test subjects". The manufacturers do not want to invest money on quality assurance, which justifies the low price-point of these cameras. Anyway, I returned my Tenvis cameras back to Amazon for a full refund. Now, I am now looking to purchase a CCTV system instead of IP camera technology.

Reviews.Title: MUCH better than Foscam
Reviews.Author: Bethany
Reviews.Content: I debated cheaper IP cams and whether or not the set up would be worth it.  Then on a trip to my dads house, he asked me to set up his Foscam (similar model).  While it was difficult (2+ hrs), I had the confidence that I would be able to do it again for my own home.  I ordered the Tenvis simply because it was cheaper and seemed almost identical, however, when I got to the set up, the instructions were much more clear and the software was easier!  10 minutes in, I had wifi configured.  I'm sure it will take me a little bit longer to set up port forwarding--but only because I cant remember my router log in.  The directions are MUCH more clear on how to set this up.  The picture quality?  Its not DSLR quality, but what do you expect?  For $45, it does what I need.  And with as simple as it was to set up, I plan on having 2 more.  One for my dog, one for my baby, and one for the entryway to my house.

Reviews.Title: Great product !
Reviews.Author: Carlos L. Garcia
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with my shopping . I will probably get couple more wireless cam in the future. Thanks a lot Tenvis

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Wendy Morgan
Reviews.Content: Great camera, easy setup. Works well with both my android phone and my ipad. Defiantly recommend for any use indoor or out.

Reviews.Title: Excellent performance
Reviews.Author: David Kingsolver
Reviews.Content: Nice quality product. Works good even at 0 deg F. Easy to upgrade firmware and good mounting system. I will buy another if needed.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic security camera
Reviews.Author: btighe
Reviews.Content: I love this product. I feel more secure when I leave my home. As I can bring it up on my phone or tablet, and see the inside and around the outside of my home. My home had been broken into and my mail had been stolen. So I ended up buying 3 of these cameras for security around my home. They more than do the job. If I had any problems with them I was able to get answers fairly quickly from Tenvis. I highly recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: ironmonkey
Reviews.Content: easy setup and work great! night vision provides a good quality image.Daytime imaging provides good imaging  as well I'm happy i bought two of them.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected!
Reviews.Author: veliss
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera so my daughter and her husband could keep an eye on their dogs while at work as they have a doggie door and the dogs are free to go out in the yard while they are gone.  It is a fenced in back yard.  Mainly they wanted to see if the dogs barked at all while out there.  The microphone works great and the night vision is wonderful.  The view was sometimes slow to update, but that has to do with their internet service, and not the camera.Very good quality.  Happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Camala Hart
Reviews.Content: Basic-needs WiFi camera with pan-n-tilt and versatile email alarm settings.Manual focus is available and makes picture clearer.  Be sure to take off protective plastic from the lens and adjust the focus for best picture.Setup takes about 5-10 minutes wired, then you can disconnect it from Ethernet and place/mount camera just about anywhere.We are not using the 2-way voice communication feature, but you will need to use Active-x (IE web browser) or a phone app capable of 2-way communication if you want to use this feature.Longevity: I know of 3 of these cameras in use prior to our most recent purchase.  All are still functioning (over 1 year).  One was used outdoors for several months under a protected structure (cold, wind, rain) and survived, although outdoor use is not recommended for this camera.For the price, this is easily a 5 star camera.  But don't expect HD, just practical use with pretty sharp 640x480 resolution.

Reviews.Title: Appropriate value for the price.
Reviews.Author: Carl M Rapp, MBA
Reviews.Content: Having experience with a substantial variety of home security cameras, I have chosen a rating of 4 out of 5 stars based upon a comparison to some other cameras (such as x10, Foscam) in this price range.For the purpose of just standard security, the Tenvis works well with few exceptions, which I believe I must note.  Turning the night vision feature on and off, a real necessity in interactive security maintenance, is cumbersome with this product.  I must mention that some products in this price range don't even have night vision though.In addition, maintaining connectivity - particularly utilizing Wi-Fi - is a real difficult process.  I often lost the signal, and I know it wasn't a proximity issue because the camera was only 5-7 feet away from the computer/router, and other devices that I linked to in this way, such as RoKu, worked a bit more efficiently in this regard.The picture is generally clear, however, and the corresponding programs are not difficult to work with (x10, with a product line with such potential, is such a hassle in this regard).To be very honest, Tenvis has requested this review.  I think this is a good thing if they are trying to improve their product(s), but because of the points listed above I cannot give them a perfect 5 out of 5 rating.  I believe customer input is important to both the company providing the product and the consumer.  It's almost like a shared value (thanks to Mr. Porter) type effort to improve efficiency.But overall, I like the Tenvis camera, and would probably recommend it to interested persons.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Budget Home Monitoring Camera
Reviews.Author: Joshua Inglima
Reviews.Content: I now am the proud owner of 3 of these fine cameras.For anyone with some networking know-how, these cameras are simple to setup and work well with the iSpyConnect software available from a 3rd party.The built-in web control software is easy to use and works well.  There is also an iOS app available from Tenvis that allows you to connect an iPhone/iPod Touch to the cameras.  Unfortunately, there is not an iPad version at this time. Also, to get full functionality of the built-in mic/speaker, you have to use Internet Explorer on Windows.  I hope that these limitations will be solved in future firmware releases.

Reviews.Title: It is easy to use
Reviews.Author: Elena
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use and is a big offer if you can buy two at the same purchase. Now I can watch from everywere my business

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: gaurgo
Reviews.Content: This camera is excellent for surveillance and like children monitor. This camera is accessible from Android applications then I love its functionality. Unlike monitors for babies, this product does not play the noise.

Reviews.Title: Simple to setup and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The title pretty much says it all.  Got this camera to monitor my old dog who has problems getting around and home alone most of the day.  Worked great for a quick check in from my Android phone or Windows pc.  I have tried motion detection and night vision with great results.  And you can check over the internet with ease.  The audio works well also although it needs to be pretty quiet.  Would recommend this camera to anyone needing simple video monitoring.  Only real drawback is scheduling tool: tedious to use.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect
Reviews.Author: Boris Nikolaevsky
Reviews.Content: Good camera, timely delivery, works very well in darkEasy to set up and accessVery useful as baby monitoringBoris N

Reviews.Title: Super Easy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Camera came with easy to follow instructions and it took maybe ten minutes to have it up and running. Its fantastic to see what's going on at home when your away.

Reviews.Title: Baby Monitor EzPezy
Reviews.Author: Brandon Ipock
Reviews.Content: This camera has been awesome. My wife needed that extra sence of security being able to see our son sleeping in his room. This was a cost effective and simple solution. I can't even imagine how many middle of the night panicks this has simple piece of equipment has prevented. There is only a minor problem of the camera re-setting on its own randomly. No big woop, because the camera's motor is very quiet, as the camera moves when it re-sets.  Over all, this is one of the best purchases I have made for our son and for our sanity!

Reviews.Title: Works great as a barn cam to keep a watchful eye on our animals
Reviews.Author: rick hemphill
Reviews.Content: This was easy to set up and connect to our system.  I have had no problems or issues whatsoever and the night vision works great for keeping a watchful eye on our kidding goats who prefer to have their babies in the dark.  Set up took less than 10 minutes and it is transmitting great over our wifi.  No complaints I will be getting several more to cover our other animals.  The remote tilt and swivel is perfect for checking the entire area, especially on those cold winter nights.

Reviews.Title: Great price and asset
Reviews.Author: Sergio
Reviews.Content: This well worth the price.Good item for the pice i paid.I appreaciate all the information of the device.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My wife was originally using a baby monitor for both of our kids, as they grow up is impossible to use a baby monitor to watch what they are doing.  I initially looked at multi camera baby monitors but these are way too expensive.I decided to purchase this Tenvis camera to give it a try,  I could not have asked for a better product,  my wife and I can monitor our kids through our Android phones and tablets and can even talk to  them through the camera since it also has two way audio capability. I am now planning on getting two more cameras to cover the living room plus a play room.One caution though,  this camera may not be useful as a baby monitor substitute for a new born since audio is not as sensitive,  but my kids are 4 and 2yo so I don't need audio to be as sensitive as a baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: Poor video quality
Reviews.Author: Luci
Reviews.Content: I thought it would be good enough to use but the video quality is really bad (resolution). The colors showing on the screen are awful. You will not believe that colors can be so different. Also the delay is unacceptable. Software and control works fine. Audio not tried.

Reviews.Title: One worked, one didn't
Reviews.Author: Timothy
Reviews.Content: The one camera that did work, works great!The one camera that didn't... didn't work right out of the box. I powered it up, "found" it with the included software, logged in, and within a few minutes after programming, the camera reset itself, and cleared back to factory defaults. It repeated this process every time you tried to program it.Bottom line.. 50/50. Great camera if it works, great doorstop if it doesnt.

Reviews.Title: Great Value! Solid IP Cam
Reviews.Author: RJG
Reviews.Content: I ordered 3 of these and found them to have excellent performance for a very good price. I haven't tried using the audio features since my main interest is video only. So far I am very pleased with my purchase of these and would buy them again without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: D. Robinson
Reviews.Content: There is a reason this is one of the cheapest IP cameras out there.  The setup software was unable to locate the camera on the network.  I ended up using the web interface to configure it (192.168.1.239:81 is the default IP).  The web interface has a setup screen for dyndns service, but apparently it doesn't actually work once you do some poking on the manufacturers forums.  I sent the first one back because I thought it was broken.  Apparently because this model has no IR filter, green looks grey or purple.  Tenvis claims this is normal.  Maybe it is, but I purchased a color camera, and the last time I checked, green is a color.Color quality and unfinished software aside, it works.  The IR night imaging is works well.  Pan/Tilt works well if not a bit slow.Bottom line... spend the extra $20 and get the newer model with the IR-cut.

Reviews.Title: three stars because it works... but
Reviews.Author: IZbraun
Reviews.Content: I looked at this unit compared to the Foscam and decided on this unit.  I’ll start by saying, it’s worming… sort-of.  I can view the camera with any device (iPad, iPhone, Android, and Computer) that in connected to the same network but as soon as we leave the house and try to connect via the internet, it doesn’t work.  Apparently, this problem has something to do with the internet modem I’m using.  I’m using this as a baby monitor so I don’t really mind (in fact prefer) that it can’t be viewed via the internet.This was NO easy system to set up… there’s several steps that had to be taken and many of these steps were NOT spelled out in the instructions.  For example, my home network name had a space between two words (home network).  The system didn’t like this but didn’t specifically tell you, it just gave you an error message during setup and you had to guess what the error was.  There was no indication anywhere in the instruction either that this would cause a problem.  After a lot of trouble shooting I deduced the problem and I re-named my network without the space (homenetwork).  The system suddenly worked.  I also noticed during the trouble shooting process that in the set-up, you will often times have to enter the information twice or even 3 times for it to “take”.  I’d enter the information and the system would come back with an error; I’d enter it again, and sometimes again, and it would suddenly accept the info.The instructions are not very easy to follow and there is essentially NO tech support for this product.  At certain points during the setup it would say “contact dealer”.  I’m pretty sure if I called Amazon for help I’d be out of luck.  There is a phone number to call but it’s in Hong Kong and unless you used Skype (or similar) the call itself would likely cost you more than the camera.I have no idea whether the Foscam is any better but next time I would probably pay the few extra bucks and get it over the Tenvis.

Reviews.Title: IP CAM
Reviews.Author: Luther
Reviews.Content: This IP cam is great. I hooked it up no problem. Only thing about it is it might not support some routers. I had a router/modem combo so mine was not supported for wireless, so it had to be wired. other then that its really good.

Reviews.Title: great product for the price
Reviews.Author: kathleen manuta
Reviews.Content: great camera. interface is good. installation is good. camera is 3.6mm, and sometimes to close to the subject. Used for indoor viewing.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality Camera
Reviews.Author: F. Ploude
Reviews.Content: I have two Foscam surveillance cameras and was about to purchase a third when I saw the TENVIS IP camera for sale at $15 less.  It looked just like the Foscam so I therefore conjectured that it was probably made at the same factory.  I must have been wrong because the TENVIS camera is certainly a low end product.  The picture is very grainy.  I couldn't recognize an intruder if my life depended on it.  The software that came with the camera is similar the software included with the Foscam but the internet sharing application is unreliable.  Most times when accessing the camera remotely, all I get is a black screen.  I regret buying this cheap camera. I didn't save any money because now I have to replace it with something more reliable.

Reviews.Title: Works 3 out of the 4 ways you can use it just not the way I would guess many people want to use it...
Reviews.Author: na
Reviews.Content: I bought this so my wife could spy on the dogs when we're away.  I ordered this on a Sunday afternoon and it arrived Monday early.  Thanks Amazon!  But it goes downhill from there.  The camera feels like a cheap bobble head that will snap if you touch it and I'm not one to complain about Chinese products.The setup was ok, NOT using the horrible manual (thanks to another user).  I had to update/reset the firmware 3 times before it reported the latest firmware.  I was viewing my office via a cable connection in 20 minutes.  WiFi was also fairly easy, although I've supported computers/networks for decades, my Mom would not be able to set this up.  Then I tried to view it remotely (from another person's network), no dice.I ended up plugging the camera back into a cable and fiddled around and finally got remote viewing working.  I spent several hours on the manufacturers support page.  There are many support threads posted about this/other WiFi failures.  The tech support appears to be a couple parrots, repeating the same 5, or so, "fixes", until the user gives up.  WiFi is a pretty simple thing nowadays.Long story short, I bought a WiFi camera for WiFi, remote viewing.  It doesn't work, or this particular camera is doa.  I gave it 2 stars simply because I succeeded in setting it up 3 out of the 4 ways you can use it, just not the way I needed/wanted.  The picture is ok for a 640x480 camera, could be better.  And night vision works.

Reviews.Title: A little buggy, audio is worthless, video quality is ok,
Reviews.Author: T. Dulaney
Reviews.Content: A little buggy, audio is worthless, video quality is ok, but if its not in a super important location it is worth the low price. If you need something more reliable, spend a couple extra bucks for a name brand.We use it for a baby video monitor, and use a traditional baby monitor for sound. We just look at our tablet when we her our little girl making noises. It does exactly what we need it to so i gave it 4 stars. It is a little buggy and for most people they would probably rate it a 3 or 2 for what they need it for.

Reviews.Title: Buy it. Awesome Value
Reviews.Author: marlena besser
Reviews.Content: Awesome for nursery use and got it outside my door to see who's leerking, lol. All of the camera's are made in China anyway.

Reviews.Title: Good camera.
Reviews.Author: K. Jens "Kiki"
Reviews.Content: It resets a lot so we have to readjust where the camera is pointing. Otherwise, great wireless cam. Amazing price. We have 2 of these, and each of my sisters have one. No problems.

Reviews.Title: OK but not compatible with all Internet Service Providers' remote control.
Reviews.Author: Paul Carr
Reviews.Content: The WiFi device seems to capture video and point but is not compatible with Verizon Home Monitoring and Control HMC.

Reviews.Title: Waste Of Money
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Return window expired before I tried setting it up. Unable to download the wi fi program as per the instructions. Stuck with an un useable piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Markster2
Reviews.Content: This thing works really well. Pan and Tilt at this price and it worked right out of the box with easy setup. I'm satisfied so far!

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: Jason lockwood
Reviews.Content: Just wish they had English customer support numberstill trying to view for web when not homebut still good priced

Reviews.Title: Great IP Camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: jonnyb
Reviews.Content: Works Great!! Couldn't ask for a better little camera. I have it outside in a dry area and so far so GREAT! Also easy to set up

Reviews.Title: Compared to my X10, the Tenvis is satisfactory, but not great.
Reviews.Author: Camper
Reviews.Content: I knew a lot of what to expect from the Tenvis because I previously bought a very similar camera from X10.  The Tenvis camera is satisfactory for the purpose I bought it for, but it is not as serviceable as the X10.  The alarm setting is too sensitive even when set at the lowest level.  I cannot get the software to load onto Internet Explorer on my new Windows 8 computer so I cannot get full functionality on the internet when I travel (the X10 works fine).  The camera keeps rebooting as if there has been a power failure when there has been no interruption of power.  Finally, the image freezes after a few minutes and only updates when I reload the page. This gives the impression nothing has changed in the room I am monitoring when that may not be true.  On the positive side, the camera has a very good picture and is easily controlled from the internet.  Great for an occasional "snapshot" of the room.  Not so good for ongoing monitoring.  In my opinion it is a good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Can't get it to work outside of home network
Reviews.Author: Avid fan
Reviews.Content: Terrible to set up. I'm pretty good with technology but this has me stumped! Been trying since I got the camera to view it thru my iphone. Camera will only work if I'm on the home network (with computer or phone) which defeats it's purpose for me. Tech support is no help. Don't buy it unless you have an advanced degree in computers!

Reviews.Title: Expected Better
Reviews.Author: David G Schellhaas
Reviews.Content: Have to set up using Ethernet cable.Recording and saving pictures complicated.Poor sound but OK as a video monitor.

Reviews.Title: Arrived with European electrical plug...
Reviews.Author: Melynny
Reviews.Content: this item arrived with a European electrical plug.  although the voltage is 100 to 250 volts and 50 to 60 hz, this item will not work in the USA without an adapter... the package even said EU, so not sure what happened.. it's going back.. would have loved to try it though. May try again~  ( got this from  Amazon warehouse deals, so I'll bet someone else did the same thing)

Reviews.Title: Still trying to get it to work
Reviews.Author: Gary G Gammon
Reviews.Content: I am trying to get someone to help me install it. If this last try does not work I will return it.It has been a very frustrating experience

Reviews.Title: Very impressed
Reviews.Author: JaCo
Reviews.Content: I will admit I was a bit skeptical given such a low price but it works as advertised and was extremely easy to set up and use. I'm giving it 5 stars because of price, how easy it is to set up and use and very good night vision without annoying LED lights. You can shut off the blinking led power lights and all that is left are very faint red LED lights that are almost imperceivable. The only downside is that on a Mac using a web browser to view there is no sound. I'm currently using it in my babies room but am not bothered by the lack of sound as I have a dedicated baby monitor. Having the ceiling mount included is another plus. The free iPhone app also works well and would have sound if I paid the extra 2.99 for the full version but I don't need it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!!!
Reviews.Author: Clyde
Reviews.Content: I needed a good IP Camera to monitor my new born and bought the Tenvis JPT3815W. It was very easy to setup and works great!! There are certain Smartapps that also let you monitor remotely from a smartphone. The vendor was great and had it delivered in a very timely manner! I would recommend this product to anyone looking for an IP camera as it is easy to setup and works very well whether you monitoring your home/ baby from home or away.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!!
Reviews.Author: JMD
Reviews.Content: I almost can't believe this little thing works as well as it does.  Perfect for keeping an eye on your home or business!!  Easy to set up, but I used both the directions that came with the camera and directions from the Tenvis website together.  I have no problems seeing it from a remote computer or my phone (Andriod).  I will definitely be getting more of these!!!

Reviews.Title: it is a very good camera, loving it!!!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey
Reviews.Content: It is a very good camera.  The image is very clear. Love it!!!! I will buy another one and recommend it to all my friends!!!!

Reviews.Title: Quit after 3 days
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Clark
Reviews.Content: Worked like a dream for 3 whole days and then suddenly stopped. Support went from bad to worse, then the camera locator software couldn't even locate the camera anymore. Nothing support said made sense. I was referred to settings screens that don't exist. Was told to download software that never worked. I'm returning it and expect a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Excellent All-Purpose Wireless IP Surveillance Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This the fourth such camera I have purchased, and I would recommend this camera for any general surveillance use.  It's capabilities are of particular value at its price point.The Tenvis camera comes with an optional wall mount, is easy to set up, and can be accessed from almost any browser, as well as on smartphones, using the IP Cam Viewer app.  It functions well in daylight or in unlit night conditions, using its built-in infrared.  Pan and tilt features can be controlled from any location, and the camera can be set up to send real-time alerts (to desktop or via e-mail), including attached video, anytime it detects motion.  One especially nice feature is the ability to program and save default position, brightness and contrast settings, so that if power is lost temporarily, the camera will restart exactly as specified by the user.There are other wireless cameras on the market will higher resolution images, but these also generally cost much more money.  For general use, I recommend the Tenvis. All in all, this is a very nice product at an attractive price.

Reviews.Title: Good Value in an IP Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Bellouny
Reviews.Content: Received this camera when promised.  My Symantec AV software barked a bit about it but once the software was installed had no issues.  Picture quality was reasonable and the motion to email worked perfectly.  This is a great alternative to the higher priced options available.

Reviews.Title: Great product for monitoring your home!
Reviews.Author: Kirsten Gunsolus
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product so that I could keep an eye on the goings on in my house when I am not there (with 2 young adult men and tennants in my basement, you never know!).  Although I did have some difficulty with set up, there was enough help out there on the internet that I was able to figure out how to get the camera set up so it would work wirelessly and so I could access it remotely.  I have the IP cam viewer app on my cell phone so at any time, I can check in and see what's going on! I love that I can move the camera around so I can view the whole room.  The night vision is better than I expected, and this really is a GREAT product for the money!If you want to keep an eye on pets or kids, or whatever, this is a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Barone
Reviews.Content: The product is very very very good. high quality and security for my house . i'm very satisfaction with this product. best

Reviews.Title: Great Product and Great Price
Reviews.Author: Carlos Andres Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Great product and great price. It is too easy to install. it have a amazin view. I will buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam for the money!!
Reviews.Author: michael mariani
Reviews.Content: I give this a 5 star rating because I have purchased 2 of the camera's and they are still working like the day I bought them. For the money the pan/tilt is great! I use the white one to keep an eye on my newborn daughter!! Works great!! for 1/3 the cost of a baby monitor!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product!
Reviews.Author: William G Cook
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Easy setup and arrived fast. I'm ordering a second one.It's not only color but you can hear and speak to whom ever you see.

Reviews.Title: Great product and price ..if it worked and if the support site was up..
Reviews.Author: gb_ott
Reviews.Content: Good points:- Price point- General quality and functionality except (see below)- Mobile access - Alot of apps seem to have some degree of support for the productBad points:- Motion does not work correctly. It spews pictures at the rate set in alert intervals for zero movement- Support site is down to validate firmware. 404 message is NOT 'kewl'. Not sure if this company is going under..but this is not acceptable..I plan to return this product if I cannot get the motion working correctly (which was definitely part of the reason for the purchase).UPDATE: I updated the firmware to the latest build (1.7.19 1.7) found on the Tenvis forums as the website seems to still be in maintenance mode. Looks like the motion detection is now working correctly.  I have bumped up the review by one pending further testing and seeing if more features/enhancements come out including ability to disable sound completely by the admin only account.

Reviews.Title: good for night only
Reviews.Author: Piotr
Reviews.Content: ok, i'm ordinary buyer; i do not know everything about cameras, filters, etc... i just wanted to buy camera which will be easy in use and will give acceptable results - this one doesn't fulfill second point - colors are horrible.- to setup this camera your network must work on 192.168.1.xxx addresses (you can change ip address for it later, it can also get it from dhcp. but for start you must have access to 192.168.1.xxx network)- this camera doesn't have something like 'ir-cut' functionality, it offer night vision but during a day the grass is purple.2 stars - one for setup, second for night vision - it works fine in b&w;

Reviews.Title: Nice camera easy to use
Reviews.Author: eepilot
Reviews.Content: Nice looking camera's. for the money you can't beat it. Only 4 stars because the app doesn't let you use the audio functions unless you pay for the app. Audio functions are free if viewing on PC? They connect easily and the wireless has decent range. There is a slight time delay with video and sound but for my purpose these are great. Will probably purchase a couple more along with an outdoor version.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: It would be better if it could zoom. But for what it is it is real good. Does what it is supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: Great inexpensive camera
Reviews.Author: O. Amaya "Fantasy Femme Fatale"
Reviews.Content: This product met my expectations. I plan to invest in some  more cameras because I'm able view what is going on via the Internet. It was very easy to set up. 1 thing I do not like is the power cord which is very short other than that it is a great product.

Reviews.Title: Bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: Tman
Reviews.Content: These are great little security cameras!  I've bought 3 of them for around my home. They pack a lot of features, especially for the money. A great feature is how it can e-mail you stills when it detects motion.  Image quality is basic security cam quality, but it produces great results in night vision mode.  Wi-Fi makes it easy to move them around the property. I would (and have) recommended these as great low cost security monitoring cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great Web Cam!
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: This is a great web cam. The images are clear and the sound is solid. I have yet to have an issue and will continue to enjoy my cam! Thanks

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Device
Reviews.Author: Jabran
Reviews.Content: Own this product and it helps in capturing pictures of customers or employees to see what they are doing.  Goes in the system, the Wifi Helps too.

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: A. Legaspi "simple minds"
Reviews.Content: this is a must item for every security conscious people, modern, sleek dependable and most of all practical in terms of budget without sacrificing quality and functionality.

Reviews.Title: Great product...
Reviews.Author: Anandjt
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera, setup was easy using wired internet. I can view my home and nanny from my office via the iphone app and so can my wife from her office.The only suggestion is that we cannot hear the voice via the iphone app but can do so using a laptop. Also am using the cam on wifi.Thanks for this reasonably priced camera.Anandjthakkar.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding for the price!
Reviews.Author: c_rangel
Reviews.Content: Received my camera in a reasonable time (a few days), I have purchased other IP cameras way more expensive and this is the one camera I like very much.I will shop again at ACCDEPOT!

Reviews.Title: These cameras are outstanding
Reviews.Author: Steven C Strothmann
Reviews.Content: The TENVIS JPT3815W is an excellent Wireless camera.  We are using it as a baby monitor and low light capability is excellent.The interface is very good on our Android, iPhone and iPads

Reviews.Title: Tenvis IP camera
Reviews.Author: chente
Reviews.Content: for the price, image quality is very very good, better than my Dlink, but the image size is not as large at same resolution, I needed to change ac freq to 60hz for us operation, pan and tilt has speed adjustments, have it set to fastest setting which to me should be the normal setting, image lags sometimes, camera came with latest firmware version where you could turn off the power led in the front of the camera for more stealth, I need to still test the wireless distance coverage.

Reviews.Title: Excellent IP Cam
Reviews.Author: Matthew Warner "mkw87"
Reviews.Content: I was worried about the quality of this item, but trusting some of the good reviews I went ahead and ordered two.  I am not disappointed, the cameras were very easy and quick to set up and I have them configured so I can view them from my phone, computers, and tablets.A couple things worth mentioning:  - Audio from my phone or tablet to the camera is actually pretty high quality.  Audio from the camera is terrible, but that's been noted by many others.  - The movement controls work pretty well from within the wifi network.  Outside the response is highly dependent on your network connection from both the controlling device and you ISP to your home.  It's not unbearable on 4G from a cell phone, but it's not great either.  Best bet is to use the position "bookmark" feature.  - The nightvision works very well, at least indoors it does.  I haven't tested them outside.I haven't used all of the features available, but these cameras appear very capable.One thing to be sure is make sure you change the default password.  The DDNS service is great but leaves you slightly vulnerable until you change the password.

Reviews.Title: Price is good, but need to improve color of picture
Reviews.Author: Hui Lai
Reviews.Content: Lose real color, for example, grass looks like purple, supposely should be green.Night vision cannot go thru window glass

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Randall Soergel "Gadget man"
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the price. If your not worried about the added features of a high end camera and just want a camera to observe your belongings you have it right here. Look out at the backyard when the kids are playing to keep an eye on them.

Reviews.Title: Sending the black one to my Brother in Flagstaff
Reviews.Author: Roland K. Brown
Reviews.Content: Order #106-9556608-0197046I will keep this White one for my self and order some more next month.  Worked right out of the box...10-11-2013Roland

Reviews.Title: Hard to beat for the money
Reviews.Author: G Clark
Reviews.Content: The camera was a bit of a challenge setting up the wireless but was able to overcome. The biggest problem was operator error. The unit worked to exceptions and produce a image equal to much higher priced models. For the price point, you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: prefect baby monitor!
Reviews.Author: cboggz
Reviews.Content: I Love That You Can Move This Camera From Room To Room And You Call Also Get It Right On Your Cell Phone!! The pc Setup Was ReallySimple But The Cell Phone SetUp Was A Little Trickier. You Have To Use PortForwarding And You Can Google Port Forwarding For A Tenvis And It Will you Can.Download A Program To Do It For You. And I Did PurchaseAn App On My Anroid For 3.99 So I Coups Get The Sound! ,But Totally Worth It! The app I Used Is Cslled IpCAm Viewer. I Love Being Able To Play Outside With My Oldest While My Lil One Sleeps.

Reviews.Title: tenvis cam
Reviews.Author: lorie moore
Reviews.Content: bought this cam and it has never worked right. went step by step to set it up can not see it if we are away from home. can only see it if were in our house from our computer and cell phones would never buy this product or any other tenvis product again. money wasted.

Reviews.Title: Not working wireless
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Enan Mendez"
Reviews.Content: Only work wired, not wireless , lan ok, night vision ok, control ok, sound ok, main fiture wireless not work really

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!
Reviews.Author: sailor
Reviews.Content: With researching quite number of similar cameras and mixed reviews, I decided to try this one, but I wasn't sure what to get.After I received it then started setting it up, I really like it.It has all the features I expected. The instructions in a cd was simply to follow. IP and Wifi Setup are done easily with its small software. The picture is clear in light or darker places. I have impressed with the camera.

Reviews.Title: No Customer Service provided.
Reviews.Author: C. Cid
Reviews.Content: Beware, this item is made cheap, no instructions and has no customer support. If you have some type of knowledge on ip configuration and installation of ip cameras then great but, if you dont stay away... You will get no help from customer support..You rather paid a additional 10 to 15 dollars more and get the real deal...Also try to call the seller with no help..I'm stuck with one expensive paper weight..Beware,,,

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Jesse R. Lowe "Jesse"
Reviews.Content: I HAVE SPENT HOURS TRYING TO INSTALL THIS!!!TENVIS is a Chinese based company and unless you want to call China collect for support then forget this product!!!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: this is a really great product and it is priced very fairly. i would definitely recommend this product to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera
Reviews.Author: ICE-T
Reviews.Content: works really good, Night vision can see everything works really great. great for anything happen in the office. recommend it to everyone.
